properties.body:
EASTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
ANGOLA.
1. SURVEY OPERATIONS IN PROGRESS UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE
   BY M/V WG AMUNDSEN TOWING TEN 2600 METER LONG
   CABLES IN AREAS BOUND BY:
   A. 07-27.6S 011-26.9E, 07-23.3S 011-34.5E,
      07-40.4S 011-44.2E, 07-44.7S 011-36.6E.
   B. 07-29.0S 011-37.9E, 07-27.9S 011-40.4E,
      07-30.6S 011-47.3E, 07-30.8S 011-49.1E,
      07-32.0S 011-52.7E, 07-51.9S 011-50.4E,
      07-50.4S 011-36.8E, 07-48.2S 011-35.8E.
   FOUR MILE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 2929/12(51), OPERATIONS COMPLETED.
3. CANCEL HYDROLANT 2992/12(54).
